main_definition: prepared or fully equipped to perform a specific task or action

meanings_and_examples.definition: completely prepared and able to start something immediately
meanings_and_examples.example: The team was ready to go on stage for their performance.
I'm ready to travel anywhere with just a suitcase in hand.

meanings_and_examples.definition: having completed all necessary steps before an event or action
meanings_and_examples.example: The dish is ready when it has been cooked and cooled down properly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: mentally alert, focused, and capable of handling a situation effectively
meanings_and_examples.example: She was always ready to tackle any challenge that came her way.

meanings_and_examples.definition: having the necessary resources or materials available for use
meanings_and_examples.example: The kitchen is ready when all ingredients are in place and utensils are clean.
